ovdesc.p: The purpose of this table is to identify, by means of
a User defined TAX General Condition number, a specific group of Customers which will then
be cross-related to the Group Condition Table to
define TAX conditions applicable to that group.
The key to this file is then specified on the TAX Type Condition file for specified Tax Types to allow definition of the applicable Tax rates.
To create a Group Condition,the user must identify
the Group by means of the General Condition number
defined in this table. The Group of Customers will
then be identified by means of the details held

For a Customer to be selected, it must conform to every field value defined within the TAX General Condition to qualify for a specific Group. Amending a Customer record may therefore result in reclassification of the Customer (or Account) into another Group or even to return to the 'normal conditions'.

Specifies the key to the Group for which conditions are to be defined.
The first part of the key defines the tax type as defined on the TAX.TYPE application.
Then the customer tax group which is also defined in the CUST.TAX.GRP field of TAX.TYPE.CONDITION.
The TAX.TYPE.CONDITION is used to defined specfic tax codes relating to type of tax, customer, and contract.
Made up of TAX.TYPE application key Then - (minus sign as delimiter) Then 3 numeric character prefixed with leading zeroes if necessary. (Mandatory Input)
